SELECT u.user_id userId, u.user_name name, u.mobile mobile, i.rect_invest_time rectInvestTime, IFNULL(SUM(a.invest_amt), 0) totalAmt, IFNULL( SUM( CASE WHEN a.`status` = 1 THEN a.invest_amt ELSE 0 END ), 0 ) investamt, COUNT(a.invest_id) investCount, IFNULL(SUM(a.profit), 0) profitamt, IFNULL(SUM(c.fee_amount), 0) saleamt FROM tcim_product_invest_record a LEFT JOIN tcrm_investor i on a.user_id = i.user_id LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u ON a.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN tcim_org_fee_gather c ON a.invest_id = c.invest_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.platfrom = #{platfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.user_id IN ( SELECT u.user_id FROM tcrm_user_info u WHERE u.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%','${nameOrMobile}','%' ) OR u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${nameOrMobile}','%' ) )
GROUP BY a.user_id ORDER BY rectInvestTime DESC

SELECT IFNULL( SUM(a.amt),0) value, a.deadLine name FROM ( SELECT SUM(i.invest_amt) amt, CONCAT( p.dead_line_min_value, '-', dead_line_max_value ) deadLine FROM tcim_product p LEFT JOIN tcim_product_invest_record i ON i.product_id = p.product_id
p.org_number =#{platfrom}
AND DATE_FORMAT(i.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(i.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY p.product_id ) a GROUP BY a.deadLine ORDER BY value DESC
